00056 //
00057 // undefine macros min and max to avoid conflicts with template names
00058 //
00059 #ifdef min
00060 #undef min
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 #ifdef max
00064 #undef max
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 //
00068 // template functions 'min' and 'max' are not defined for _WIN32
00069 // due to name conflicts
00070 //
00071 template < class T > inline T min( T a, T b ) { return a < b ? a : b; }
00072 template < class T > inline T max( T a, T b ) { return a > b ? a : b; }
00073 }
00074 #endif
00075 #endif

00080   public:

00084     double logLikelihood( const Array< T >& x ) const
00085     {
00086         SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) == 2 )
00087 
00088         double l = 0;
00089 
00090                 for( unsigned k = x.dim( 0 ); k--; )
00091                 {
00092                         l += log( std::max( p( x[ k ] ), 1e-100 ) );  // !!!
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 return l;
00096     }
00097
